recommendations.title: The Complete Subscription Audit Checklist
recommendations.description: Step-by-step process to identify all recurring charges, evaluate if you're still using them, and cancel unused subscriptions. Includes email templates for cancellation requests.
recommendations.rationale: You have 5 recurring subscriptions totaling approximately $139 per month. A quarterly audit can identify unused services.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Subscription Sharing: Ethical Ways to Split Costs
recommendations.description: How to legally share family plans for streaming, music, and software. Covers terms of service, payment splitting apps, and what to watch out for.
recommendations.rationale: Your $139/month in subscriptions could be reduced 30-50% through family plan sharing where allowed.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Free Alternatives to Popular Paid Subscriptions
recommendations.description: Comprehensive list of free alternatives to common paid services: streaming (library apps), productivity (Google Workspace), fitness (YouTube), and more.
recommendations.rationale: Some of your 5 subscriptions may have free alternatives that meet 80% of your needs without the monthly cost.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Setting Up Bill Alerts to Catch Price Increases
recommendations.description: How to monitor recurring charges for sneaky price increases. Covers bank alerts, calendar reminders, and subscription tracking apps.
recommendations.rationale: Subscriptions often increase prices after promotional periods. With 5 active subscriptions, alerts help you catch changes quickly.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Rocket Money (formerly Truebill) - Subscription Manager
recommendations.description: App that identifies all recurring charges, lets you cancel with one tap, and negotiates bills on your behalf. Free tier available.
recommendations.rationale: With 5 recurring subscriptions totaling $139/month, Rocket Money can identify forgotten subscriptions and negotiate lower rates.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.

recommendations.title: Mint Mobile Family Plan
recommendations.description: Ultra-low-cost cell phone service ($15-30/month). Share a family plan to reduce costs even further.
recommendations.rationale: Phone service is often one of the biggest recurring bills. Mint Mobile could cut your phone costs by 50-70% without sacrificing coverage.
recommendations.disclaimer: This is educational content, not financial advice. Consult a licensed advisor for personalized guidance.
